title: EP 480 | Phil Issues Dire Warning About American Schools & Miss Kay's Beater Had a Crazy Quirk
description:
Jase realizes how difficult it is to entertain today's youth, because they have an entire world of entertainment in their cell phones and nothing seems to impress them. Phil says it is time for Americans to consider homeschooling their children, and Al takes a look at the etymology of the word "ambassador." Phil reflects on the past, from his favorite old fishing reel brands to party line telephones and the mean old women who would hog the line. And Al remembers Miss Kay's old car that had a rusted-out floor that let you watch the road pass by or, as Jase put it, "the open floor spitoon."

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://blazetv.com/unashamed

Visit https://BullionMax.com/Unashamed and get your Silver starter kit
